import os
import discord
TOKEN = os.getenv('BOT_TOKEN', '{{bot_token}}')
client = discord.Client(intents=discord.Intents.all())
@client.event
async def on_ready():
    print('Bot ready')
@client.event
async def on_message(message):
    if message.author.bot: return
    await message.channel.send('Hello!')
client.run(TOKEN)
